Name: Birb
Text: I'm Birb, nice ta meet ya

Name: Birb
Text: If you ever have artifacts, I know a guy who's willing to give ya some cool stuff

Name: Cadus III
Text: I think I know the guy, Dr.Gimal right?

Name: Birb
Text: Ahhhh so you know the guy. If you give me the artifacts I can fly out to get you his stuff, but I gotta charge ya extra ya know?

Name: Birb
Text: Here check out his stuff, what do ya want?

Name: Birb
Text: Hey that jawbreaker thing in that gun of yours looks kinda dangerous. Maybe you can finally break that damn crystal wall and get rid of the jawbreaker infestation around here.

Name: Birb
Text: They'll never get me though, I've been planting spikes around here ta defend my place. No one gets through! Ha ha ha
